select a.id,a.card_no,b.name member_name,c.name barber_name,a.type,a.amount,a.status,a.create_time,a.creator,d.name creatorName from barber_order a left join barber_member b on a.member_id = b.id left join sys_user c on a.barber_id = c.id left join sys_user d on a.creator = d.id where a.status = 1
and a.type = #{barberOrderDO.type}
and b.name like CONCAT('%',#{barberOrderDO.memberName},'%')
and c.name like CONCAT('%',#{barberOrderDO.barberName},'%')
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= '${barberOrderDO.dateStart}'
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= '${barberOrderDO.dateEnd}'
order by a.create_time desc

SELECT type, count(id) countNum, sum(amount) amount, DATE(create_time) createTime FROM barber_order WHERE to_days(create_time) = to_days(now()) GROUP BY DATE(create_time),type ORDER BY DATE(create_time) DESC;

SELECT type, count(id) countNum, sum(amount) amount, MONTH(create_time) createTime FROM barber_order WHERE YEAR(create_time)=YEAR(NOW()) GROUP BY MONTH(create_time),type ORDER BY MONTH(create_time) DESC;

SELECT type, count(id) countNum, sum(amount) amount, MONTH(create_time) createTime FROM barber_order WHERE DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE( ) , '%Y%m' ) GROUP BY MONTH(create_time),type

SELECT sum(a.amount) value, b.name name FROM barber_order a LEFT JOIN sys_user b on a.barber_id = b.id WHERE DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE( ) , '%Y%m' ) AND (a.type = 2 or a.type =3) GROUP BY barber_id
